siren.name: Is that... Singing?
siren.description: The whistling of the ocean breeze carries a haunting melody. After a moment, the lookout spots a small islet port-ward.

options.text: Steer well clear of that racket.

result.text: Detouring around costs valuable time, but the crew looks relieved.
The sun falls below the horizon before the dinghy makes it back to the ship. The crew is gone, in their place a bright white bird's skull scoured clean by the salt water.

dread.name: Dread On Open Water
dread.description: A shadow drifts, languidly beneath the water's surface. Before your crew realizes what it is, your ship is ensared by a monsterous brine

result.text: The crew members set flame to several torches and scortch the brine off the ship. However, a fair amount of supplies were destroyed.

sharks.name: Sharks!
sharks.description: A pack of sharks have picked up the scent of warm blood on your ship. They're hungry and viscious.

options.text: Craft a bait trap to lure them away

result.text: They seem more interested in your stores of food than your living bodies. For now.

options.text: See if the beasts are edible.

result.text: Your crew attempts to fish for the shark. Some of your crew are adapt harpoonsmen. Some of the sharks fish back. They're also adept.

redstorm.name: The Red Storm
redstorm.description: A maroon fog envelopes the ship. What began as a gentle breeze has quickly become a frightening torrent

result.text: The crew braces themselves to ride out the unforgivving storm. Though the ship survives, its seen better days.

hurricane_eye.name: Eye of the Storm
hurricane_eye.description: Safe in the heart of the gyre, the wind makes strange shapes.

result.text: From the wrecks adrift in the storm's wake, you find valuable supplies.
A few lucky sailors somehow endured the maelstrom long enough to be fished out by your crew.

Unlucky Omen.name: Unlucky Omen
Unlucky Omen.description: They say a seagul carrying an empty oyster is a sign that the route you're on isn't worth the trouble.

result.text: You decide to ignore your instincts and trust in the plan. Your journey is difficult, and so this round, there isn't much to show for it.
You decide to forgo the plan, and chart a new course for adventure. Though your crew is impressed, this lengthened the journey by quite a bit.

Charred Albatross.name: Charred Albatross
Charred Albatross.description: Just when you thought you we're going to have to eat a deep fried boot, an albatross falls onto the bow of the ship, burnt to a crisp.

options.text: Free food is my favorit kind

result.text: Who do you know that would pass up a perfectly good bird? Nobody in these waters, certainly.

merfolk_good.name: Beguiling Merfolk
merfolk_good.description: You come across a forsaken alcove that happens to be inhabited by a tribe of merfolk. They are offering to send one of their own in exchange for the goods you have on board

options.text: Exchange half your supplies to hire a Merfolk crew

result.text: The merfolk are adapt sea farrers. Their natural acclimity to the ocean will prove useful on these uncertain waters.
You decide to not hire any merfolk today.

grove.name: Paradise Grove
grove.description: You have found a legendary island, guarded by a cruel fairy succubus. She will only permit a select, lucky few to enter her sanctuary

options.text: It's worth the risk, press on!

result.text: She's thrilled to have new playthings, and piles wealth beyond reckoning on those who survived drawing lots.
You decide to fortune is not worth the life of your comrades. With an enigmatic smile she coos, "You'll be back."

mate1.name: Missing First Mate
mate1.description: The first mate has gone missing! They were last seen at midnight on their usual 'evening brood' before vanishing suddenly in the night.

result.text: Despite the efforts from the entire crew, no first mates were able to be found.
You light an emergancy flare to signal nearyby ships. After days of searching, there's no trace of them, and you're forced to move on.

serpent_eggs.name: A Serpent Writhes
serpent_eggs.description: A giant, 45ft sea serpant made itself a nest on your ship last night. Now it is napping menacingly on the poop deck.

result.text: You battle against the vile monster, but many of your crew perished in the fight.
This particular species of sea serpant require firm land to lay their eggs. Seeing none around, it just the next best place, your ship.

crates_1.name: Crates, Adrift
crates_1.description: Crates arrive, caught in your fishing net. Supplies from another crew? contraband confescate by the navy? what could be inside?

result.text: You find a shipment of undeniably delicious yer' guanavanaa fruit.

options.text: Cursed! Cursed! Cast it back into the deep!

result.text: Some mysteries are better left unsolved.
